name: "The Man with Striped Pants" Original Illustration
description: This original illustration by Ben Ramirez is hand drawn on paper and colored with watercolor. Piece measures 4"x6" and the frame is painted wood measuring 5"x7".

name: North Beach Letterpress Poster
description:
Available now is the very first letter press print from the Ben Ramirez Design. Designed and hand printed personally by Ben Ramirez, this grey ink on heavy white card stock print measures 11"x18" and is signed and numbered by the artist. With a .5" border for framing.

Designed in North Beach, printed at the temporary Levi's Workshop on Valencia Street in July of 2010. Press used: Vandercook 32-28. An historical piece on many fronts, get one while they last!
